encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Revised text and updated metadata.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - This encoding shows a high number of errors and needs almost complete rewriting: Add lost.?lin at beginning and end. Change all dots to illegible characters. Add underdots (passim). Add modern diacritics and punctuation. Encode ancient punctuarion.

General - I had to create a dummy HGV record to push this file through to the DCLP board. Do not be put off by the existence of the HGV record. The HGV file that had landed in the master GitHub repo has now been deleted. It was no longer necessary. Simply process the DCLP file as normal. When it is finalized and appears in DCLP there will be no display of any HGV file.
Finalized - Revised text and updated metadata.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - This encoding shows a high number of errors and needs almost complete rewriting: Add lost.?lin at beginning and end. Change all dots to illegible characters. Add underdots (passim). Add modern diacritics and punctuation. Encode ancient punctuarion.

General - I had to create a dummy HGV record to push this file through to the DCLP board. Do not be put off by the existence of the HGV record. The HGV file that had landed in the master GitHub repo has now been deleted. It was no longer necessary. Simply process the DCLP file as normal. When it is finalized and appears in DCLP there will be no display of any HGV file.
